recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Manajemen Logistik, Administrasi Bisnis, Ekonomi, Manajemen (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description: The intern will support the International Business team in managing demand planning and forecasting activities for overseas markets. Responsibilities include collecting, analyzing, and integrating data of inventory, demand plan, and shipment plan. Assisting in preparing weekly and monthly forecasts, and monitoring stock availability to support decission making, and ensure smooth product shipment as per plan. The intern will also coordinate with Operation team, Commercial team, and Demand Planner to align demand plans. The position is based in Gunung Putri.
